summary: Two Chinese friends, who operate a food truck in Barcelona, Spain, use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect the pickpocket Sylvia, who's been targeted by a ruthless gang.
cast: Jackie Chan|Biao Yuen|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Benny Urquidez|Keith Vitali|Herb Edelman|Lola Forner|Susana Sentís|José Sancho|Miguel Palenzuela|Josep Lluís Fonoll|Amparo Moreno|Montserrat Julió|Luis Monte|Josep L. Dallester|Miguel Avilés|Mercedes Albert|Carles Canut|Paul Chang Chung|Kar Lok Chin|Alejo del Peral|Mariló Domínguez|Stanley Sui-Fan Fung|Pep Guinyol|Blackie Shou Liang Ko|Mars|Germán Monzó|Richard Ng|John Sham|Juan Subatella|Wu Ma
director: Director: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung (as Samo Hung)
title: Los supercamorristas
